rcpt.title: Sunrise Garden Lake Resort
rcpt.posDetails1: THIS INVOICE/RECEIPT SHALL BE VALID FOR(5) YEARS FROM THE DATE OF THE PERMIT TO USE
rcpt.posDetails2: THIS SERVES AS YOUR OFFICIAL RECEIPT KEEP THIS FOR FUTURE USE
rcpt.posDetails3: Defective returns will be evaluated in accordance with DTI regulations.
rcpt.posDetails4: Returns without receipt will require verification and charged with a 10% fee.
